algorithm_technique: Pre-process the array to store indices of the target element 'x' in a list, then use binary search or direct indexing for queries.
problem_summary_simple: Find the index of the k-th occurrence of a number 'x' in an array.
problem_summary_technical: Stores indices of 'x' in a lookup array, then answers queries by indexing into this lookup.
key_insights: Pre-computation is key for efficient query answering.
Storing all occurrences of 'x' allows for O(1) lookup per query after initial processing.
Edge cases include when the requested occurrence count exceeds the actual occurrences.
